title: Why does the Chevy EV tow TWICE as far as the Cybertruck?!

Watch Engineering Explained talk about the Cybertrucks High pressure zone:   Watch my full EV Humvee build here:   Its pretty crazy that the Silverado can be 'filled up' with about 25 dollars of electricity and go drive 450 miles. But how far can it drive with a full 11,000 pound trailer behind it? Today we find out!  How far can the Chevy Silverado EV tow 11,000lbs? - (New Champion)
